title: 5 Amazon KDP Niches to Avoid at All Costs
description:
If your goal is to actually make money on Amazon KDP, today’s video is for you. I’ll show you the worst-selling self-publishing niches on Amazon, across low-content, nonfiction, and fiction, and I’ll share smarter, more profitable angles you can use instead.
